字号大小一致/字号大小一致_0012.jpg.mt:
Wrinkled skin and thin peel are my characteristics.
Long exposure to sunlight will dry the leaves, and the more ripe it gets!
Because our dragon fruits grow in tropical highland farms with ample sunlight, the natural growth of dragon fruits with sufficient sunlight and rain will cause some fruits to have dry, wrinkled, scarred, black-spotted, and water-cracked skin. These are normal and do not affect the flesh. In fact, dragon fruits that have experienced wind, sun, and rain, and grown naturally are even sweeter and juicier.
Wrinkled skin
Water cracks, scars
Dry head, slightly black leaf scales
After picking, the stem of the dragon fruit, like aloe or cactus, contains a lot of moisture. If not dried properly, it can mold. You can either cut off the stem or leave it as is and eat the fruit normally. The flesh is not affected. If you mind, please do not purchase!
src: 日照时间长，果叶会干瘪，越瘪越熟哦！
因为我们的火龙果生长在热带高山农场，阳光照射充足，火龙果自然生长充分的光照和雨露滋润会使部分果子表皮有干枯、褶皱、疤痕、黑斑和水裂纹的现象，这些都情况是正常的，不会影响到果肉，反而这种经历过风吹日晒雨打、自然生长的火龙果才更加的香甜多汁。
火龙果摘果后把处就像芦荟或者仙人掌一样，水分很大很多，稍微不干燥就会发霉，可以直接将果把切掉或者不管它正常开果吃，果肉是没有影响的，介意勿拍！

About Packaging  
We understand the importance of shipping safety to the customer experience and meticulously maintain packaging to ensure product safety during transportation.  
Carton Packaging  
Carton + Wooden Frame  
Woven Bag Packaging  
Woven Bag + Wooden Frame  
Five-layer Corrugated Board  
Foam Board  
Anti-scratch Pearl Cotton  
Anti-collision Corner Protectors  
*Different packaging is selected based on the product's attributes and materials.
src: 我们深知运输安全对客户体验的重要性，在产品的包装上进行精心的保持务求保护产品运输安全
*根据不同产品属性及材质选择不同的包装

字号大小一致/字号大小一致_0070.jpg.mt:
Hydrating and nourishing for long-lasting radiance  
Astragalus membranaceus root extract  
Contains the important active ingredient astragaloside, which can to some extent prevent skin oxidation and improve skin condition.  
Hydration  
Moisturizing  
Paeonia lactiflora root extract  
Made from natural peony root extract, without added preservatives or other chemical moisturizers, it has moisturizing properties.
src: 水润养肤 持久透亮
含有重要活性成分黄芪皂苷，能一定程度上防止皮肤氧化，调理皮肤状态。
采用天然芍药根提取物，不添加防腐剂和其他化学保湿剂，具有保湿的功效。
